      • OAuthAdminServiceImpl

    • Method Detail

      • registerOAuthConsumer

        public String[] registerOAuthConsumer()
                               throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Registers an consumer secret against the logged in user. A given user can only have a single consumer secret at a time. Calling this method again and again will update the existing consumer secret key.
        Returns:
        An array containing the consumer key and the consumer secret correspondingly.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when persisting the data in the persistence store.

      • getAllOAuthApplicationData

        public OAuthConsumerAppDTO[] getAllOAuthApplicationData()
                                                 throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Get all registered OAuth applications for the logged in user.
        Returns:
        An array of OAuthConsumerAppDTO objecting containing the application information of the user
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when reading the data from the persistence store.

      • getOAuthApplicationData

        public OAuthConsumerAppDTO getOAuthApplicationData(String consumerKey)
                                            throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Get OAuth application data by the consumer key.
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - Consumer Key
        Returns:
        OAuthConsumerAppDTO with application information
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when reading application information from persistence store.

      • getOAuthApplicationDataByAppName

        public OAuthConsumerAppDTO getOAuthApplicationDataByAppName(String appName)
                                                     throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Get OAuth application data by the application name.
        Parameters:
        appName - OAuth application name
        Returns:
        OAuthConsumerAppDTO with application information
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when reading application information from persistence store.

      • registerOAuthApplicationData

        public void registerOAuthApplicationData(OAuthConsumerAppDTO application)
                                  throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Registers an OAuth consumer application.
        Parameters:
        application - OAuthConsumerAppDTO with application information
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when persisting the application information to the persistence store.

      • registerAndRetrieveOAuthApplicationData

        public OAuthConsumerAppDTO registerAndRetrieveOAuthApplicationData(OAuthConsumerAppDTO application)
                                                            throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Registers an OAuth consumer application and retrieve application details.
        Parameters:
        application - OAuthConsumerAppDTO with application information.
        Returns:
        OAuthConsumerAppDTO Created OAuth application details.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when persisting the application information to the persistence store.

                               throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Update existing consumer application.
        Parameters:
        consumerAppDTO - OAuthConsumerAppDTO with updated application information
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when updating the underlying identity persistence store.

      • addScope

        public void addScope(String scope,
                     String[] claims)
              throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        To insert oidc scopes and claims in the related db tables.
        Parameters:
        scope - an oidc scope
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - if an error occurs when inserting scopes or claims.

      • getScopes

        public ScopeDTO[] getScopes()
                     throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        To retrieve all persisted oidc scopes with mapped claims.
        Returns:
        all persisted scopes and claims
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when loading scopes and claims.
        IdentityOAuthAdminException

      • deleteScope

        public void deleteScope(String scope)
                 throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        To remove persisted scopes and claims.
        Parameters:
        scope - oidc scope
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - if an error occurs when deleting scopes and claims.

      • getScopeNames

        public String[] getScopeNames()
                       throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        To retrieve all persisted oidc scopes.
        Returns:
        list of scopes persisted.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when loading oidc scopes.
        IdentityOAuthAdminException

      • getClaims

        public String[] getClaims(String scope)
                   throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        To retrieve oidc claims mapped to an oidc scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope
        Returns:
        list of claims which are mapped to the oidc scope.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when lading oidc claims.
        IdentityOAuthAdminException

      • updateScope

        public void updateScope(String scope,
                        String[] addClaims,
                        String[] deleteClaims)
                 throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        To add new claims for an existing scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope name
        addClaims - list of oidc claims to be added
        deleteClaims - list of oidc claims to be deleted
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when adding a new claim for a scope.
        IdentityOAuthAdminException

      • isScopeExist

        public boolean isScopeExist(String scope)
                     throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        To load id of the scope table.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope name
        Returns:
        id of the given scope
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when loading scope id.
        IdentityOAuthAdminException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getAppsAuthorizedByUser

        public OAuthConsumerAppDTO[] getAppsAuthorizedByUser()
                                              throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Get apps that are authorized by the given user
        Returns:
        OAuth applications authorized by the user that have tokens in ACTIVE or EXPIRED state
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException

      • revokeAuthzForAppsByResourceOwner

        public OAuthRevocationResponseDTO revokeAuthzForAppsByResourceOwner(OAuthRevocationRequestDTO revokeRequestDTO)
                                                             throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Revoke authorization for OAuth apps by resource owners
        Parameters:
        revokeRequestDTO - DTO representing authorized user and apps[]
        Returns:
        revokeRespDTO DTO representing success or failure message
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException

      • updateApproveAlwaysForAppConsentByResourceOwner

        public OAuthRevocationResponseDTO updateApproveAlwaysForAppConsentByResourceOwner(String appName,
                                                                                  String state)
                                                                           throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Revoke approve always of the consent for OAuth apps by resource owners
        Parameters:
        appName - name of the app
        state - state of the approve always
        Returns:
        revokeRespDTO DTO representing success or failure message
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException

      • getAllowedScopeValidators

        public String[] getAllowedScopeValidators()
        Get the registered scope validators from OAuth server configuration file.
        Returns:
        List of string containing simple names of the registered validator class.

      • getSupportedTokenTypes

        public List<String> getSupportedTokenTypes()
        Get the registered oauth token types from OAuth server configuration file.
        Returns:
        List of supported oauth token types

      • isRefreshTokenRenewalEnabled

        public boolean isRefreshTokenRenewalEnabled()
        Get the renew refresh token property value from identity.xml file.
        Returns:
        renew refresh token property value

      • isPKCESupportEnabled

        public boolean isPKCESupportEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if PKCE is supported by the database, false if not

      • getTokenExpiryTimes

        public OAuthTokenExpiryTimeDTO getTokenExpiryTimes()

      • getSupportedIDTokenAlgorithms

        public OAuthIDTokenAlgorithmDTO getSupportedIDTokenAlgorithms()
        Get supported algorithms from OAuthServerConfiguration and construct an OAuthIDTokenAlgorithmDTO object.
        Returns:
        Constructed OAuthIDTokenAlgorithmDTO object with supported algorithms.

      • isHashDisabled

        public boolean isHashDisabled()
        Check whether hashing oauth keys (consumer secret, access token, refresh token and authorization code) configuration is disabled or not in identity.xml file.
        Returns:
        Whether hash feature is disabled or not.
